MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 5:05AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still carrying out further investigations affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:32AM on 21 March 2021.
